name: Asociatia pentru Promovarea Alimentului Romanesc
membership: APAR este membra a Federatiei Nationale PRO AGRO si prin aceasta este membra a COPA-COGECA.
goal:
PRO ROMANIAN FOOD ASSOCIATION – APAR is a non-governmental, non-profit, apolitical association, founded in March of 2012 by the free association of several producers of food who identified the need to promote Romanian products both on the national and International market.
APAR inspired by the values we share, the mission, vision and originality. The association addresses mainly agro-food producers and processors, offering them by size, specific and individual goals, promoting solutions to the markets.
Our organization has over 70 members working in food industry and whose turnover represents 1 billion euros, representing over 12% of Romanian food sector.
Pro Romanian Food Association-PRFA is the place where problems meet the right solutions and the needs find the suitable resources, in order to keep the food industry growing along with it’s supporters.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Food Safety, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Trade
